sources.title: Svengali's Cat (1946)
sources.description: A hypnotist cat charms a sweet young mouse femme-fatale into luring all the mice in town into his cellar, with intent of eating them. But, with his super-senses hitting on all cylinders, the super-hero mouse, Mighty Mouse, zooms in and puts an end to the dastardly scheme. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/svengalis-cat-1946/

metadata.Plot: A hypnotist cat charms a sweet young mouse femme-fatale into luring all the mice in town into his cellar, with intent of eating them. But, with his super-senses hitting on all cylinders, the super-hero mouse, Mighty Mouse, zooms in and puts an end to the dastardly scheme.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
